changeSet.author: mlemons

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Allows users to copy a KPME Maintenance Document

column.name: PERM_TMPL_ID
column.valueComputed: (SELECT PERM_TMPL_ID FROM KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'KPME-WKFLW' AND NM = 'Copy KPME Maintenance Document')

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Allows users to copy a Position

column.name: KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID
column.valueComputed: (SELECT KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID FROM KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'KR-WKFLW' AND NM = 'documentTypeName')

column.name: KIM_TYP_ID
column.valueComputed: (SELECT KIM_TYP_ID FROM KRIM_TYP_T WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'KR-SYS' AND NM = 'Document Type & Routing Node or State')

changeSet.comment: Adding HR Organization Approver role to Edit Position

column.valueComputed: (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM KRIM_ROLE_T WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'KPME-HR' AND ROLE_NM = 'HR Organization Approver')

column.name: PERM_ID
column.valueComputed: (SELECT PERM_ID FROM KRIM_PERM_T WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'KPME-HR' AND NM = 'Edit Position')
